title: Not enough IP... But I have plenty.
body:
As the title says...

When trying to purchase a 3150IP champion (I'm thinking either {{champion:37}} or {{champion:102}}), it says I do not have enough, but in reality, I honestly do (3254IP at the moment).

I have tried Googling all the answers... But no solution were found for me, so I decided to ask it myself.

I have tried restarting my client multiple times.

I am using the new client if that helps.

My apologies if this is in the wrong section. :)

replies.body: I have the same bug. I have a little of 4800 but i can only buy 3150 champs etc.

My apologies for not responding. :)

It seemed to fix it; thanks very much - I did not think about switching to Legacy. xD

The updated client might not be responding or syncing up with your actual IP balance.   Instead, log into the legacy client to make sure everything's accurate:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope it helps!
Same i have 6450 and i cant buy rengar i tried buying something else like a ad +1 but it didn't fix it
